p: With each informant, a semi-structured interview was carried out in association with the free-listing method ( Albuquerque et al., 2014) in which the interviewees were asked about the medicinal plants they knew, thus generating an initial list with the names of the plants used. For each ethnospecies (ethnobiological taxonomic category based on local communitiesâ€™ classifications) mentioned, the following question was asked: Is this plant important in the treatment of health problems? The information obtained was recorded field notebooks and forms.
